Name: Savoy Special No.1
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: An aromatised 2:1 shaken Dry Martini with a tiny dose of grenadine, which turns this the merest rust-pink, while just a dash of absinthe adds wormwood complexity.
History: Adapted from Harry Craddock's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Savoy Special No.1 contains 172 calories
